title: Light and Savory Air Cookies Recipe
summary: Enjoy these light and savory air cookies, packed with flavor and perfect for any occasion!
ingredients:
100 g margarine
100 g rice
1 package onion soup
240 ml beef broth
100 g mushrooms
instructions:
Split wienies through middles.
Cut cheese slices.
Put in wienies.
Preheat oven to 400 Â°F.
Put wienies in oven.
Cook until golden brown.
notes: Serve with a side of tangy dipping sauce. / Pair with a fresh garden salad.

title: Zesty Air Force Chicken Recipe with Zucchini
summary: Elevate your dinner with this zesty Air Force Chicken, featuring fresh zucchini and vibrant veggies for a delicious twist.
ingredients:
100 g zucchini
1 piece onions
100 g green peppers
1 tsp sugar
30 ml vinegar
1 tsp salt
1 tsp turmeric
100 g celery
powdered alum
instructions:
Melt margarine.
Add other ingredients in order given.
Bake 45 minutes at 350 Â°F.
notes: Serve with steamed rice for a complete meal. / Pair with a side salad for a fresh touch.
keywords: Air Force Chicken, zucchini recipe, easy dinner, baked chicken, healthy meal
